meanings.definition: A person in charge of a post office.
meanings.sent1: The postmaster sorted the mail efficiently.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy stamps from the postmaster.
meanings.sent3: The postmaster accidentally delivered a letter to the wrong address.
meanings.sent4: She runs the household like a postmaster organizing the mail.
meanings.sent5: The postmaster's uniform made him easily recognizable in the town.

meanings.definition: To appoint or designate as postmaster.
meanings.sent1: The mayor decided to postmaster him for the new branch.
meanings.sent2: They will postmaster someone to oversee the local post office.
meanings.sent3: I postmastered my sister to be in charge of our family's mail.
meanings.sent4: The company will postmaster a reliable employee for the position.
meanings.sent5: She postmastered her best friend to handle the mailroom duties.
